original: Karlsson, Karl Mauritz, verkst. direktör, Tornby, Linköping, f. 9/1/00 i Karlshamn av byggmäst. H. F. Karlsson o. Emma Pettersson. G. 30 m. Maja Hulthén. Barn : Anne-Marie f. 31, Ulla Margaretha 33, Karl Anders 35, Gunvor Birgitta 37, Maria Christina 41. — Realex. 15, lantbr elev 15-18, Önnestadfs 9-mån. lantman-nask., kontrollas^sist :kurs, h. avd. A-o. B-linje 18-22, förste elev v. Heden-lunda. Vadsbro, 22-23. Bokhàll. v. Sundsholms ’säteri i Fårhult 23-24, insp. där 24-27, förvalt. f. Skyllbergs Bruks A-B jordbr.-förvaltn. 27-41, v. verkst. dir. i Mell. Sv:es Lantbr. A-B i Linköp. 41-42, verkst. dir. där sed. 42 samt led. av styr. Var i Skyllberg bl. a. styr :kd. i Askersundsortens mej :fören., v. ordf. i Mariedamsortens dito, kommunalrev. samt stift, av o. styr :led. i Skyllbergs -skyttefören., led. av Linköp. stads fastigh :tax :nd, har under ett 20-tal år varit akt. verksam inom JUF, styr :led. i östergötl. distr. av dets., medv. v. anordn. av nord. ungd iveckor, riksmästersk :-plöjn. samt nord. mästersk :tävl. i plöjn., inititag. t. bild. av Riksfören. Sv :e’s gödboislkapsuppföd. u. p. a. o. led. av des’s styr. Medv. v. konstr. av mod. maskiner f. potatisodl., ss. sätt- o. plockningsmaskiner, olika slags sprutor m. m. Resor f. lantbr :stud. i Danm. o. Tyskl. 37, Engl. o. Skottl. 46. Skr.: upps. i facktidskr., särsk. ang. potatisodl. o. jordbrukets rationahser. Föredragshåll. i bl. a. radio i hithör. ämnen. JUF:s förtj- GM, Örebro läns skytteförb. förtjSM, Skyllbergs skyttefören. förtjGM, SkolskytteGM, årtalsmärke i br.
translated: Karlsson, Karl Mauritz, Managing Director, Tornby, Linköping, b. 9/1/00 in Karlshamn to builder H. F. Karlsson and Emma Pettersson. Married on 30/xx to Maja Hulthén. Children: Anne-Marie b. 31, Ulla Margaretha b. 33, Karl Anders b. 35, Gunvor Birgitta b. 37, Maria Christina b. 41. — Completed secondary school. Farmer apprentice from 15-18 at Önnestad farm school. Control assistant course, department A and B lines from 18-22, first apprentice at V. Heden-lunda, Vadsbro, 22-23. Bookkeeper at Sundsholms estate in Fårhult from 23-24, inspector there from 24-27, manager for Skyllbergs Bruks A-B agricultural management from 27-41, vice managing director at Mell. Sv:es Lantbr. A-B in Linköping from 41-42, managing director there since 42, and board member. Was, among other things, a board member of Askersundsortens dairy association, vice chairman of Mariedamsortens dairy association, municipal auditor, and a foundation member and board member of Skyllbergs shooting association. Also a board member of Linköping city real estate tax commission. Has been actively involved in JUF for about 20 years, board member in the Östergötland district, participated in the organization of Nordic youth weeks, national plowing championships, and Nordic plowing competitions. Initiated the establishment of the National Association of Swedish Cattle Raisers and served on its board. Involved in the development of modern machinery for potato cultivation, such as planting and harvesting machines, various types of sprayers, etc. Traveled for agricultural studies in Denmark and Germany in 37, and in England and Scotland in 46. Has written articles in professional journals, particularly about potato cultivation and agricultural rationalization. Gave lectures on related topics in radio programs. Honorary member of JUF, Örebro County Shooting Association, Skyllbergs shooting association, and School Shooting Association. Year badge in bronze.
